defs.name: rpc
defs.docs:
Apply `#[rpc]` to a trait, and a `to_delegate` method is generated which
 wires up methods decorated with `#[rpc]` or `#[pubsub]` attributes.
 Attach the delegate to an `IoHandler` and the methods are now callable
 via JSON-RPC.
